reviews: Many people say that this phone has battery drain issue ...but i am writing this review after 1week of usage i dont face any battery drainage issue in this...i took daily 4-5 hrs online meeting continuously during this lockdown which took about 40-50% which is normal
2. Its charging speed is very fast it charge by 0 to 90 in less then 60mins....
3.camera of this poco x2 is just awesome its 64mp sony camera is too good
4.its performance in pubg and free fire is awesome...in high graphics gam...
Good quality good performance nice camera battery backup is good I am so happy thanks Flipkart.

This is the  new Phone I'm using after 4 years. My old Phone was Redmi note 4. Poco X2 was awesome. Meet my expectations. Loved it. Overall  good performance. A little bit disappointed with the night camara performance. Otherwise it's a superb android phone. Display 120 RR really works well.
" Loved this like my note 4"
Note: Guys no words to say about back camera performance. Ooooowsammm!!!
Adding photos with out any edits

Since i want camera phone and this is the best camera phone. 120 hz refreshing rate i dont whether it works or not. But overall phone is very good. I love camera. 6 ram with 128 gb is best because 64 mp camera pic occupied 31 mb per photo and internal memory will get full very fast. Hybrid sim slot is disappointed. Audio quality in bluetooth headset is super. Charging is very faster than you expectations. Good deal for game lover. Very confused between Realme 6 pro vs Poco X2 but finally deci...
Pros-

I can surely say that it is really value for money phone....if u are looking for awesome camera, battery and performance just go for it without any doubt also charger is enough fast.i also used many phone with IPS LCD display but this one i can say one word.....great.
Cons- i must say that it is little heavier side and also no led notification light enabled by developers while it has that i hope they will fix it next ota update.

Sony IMX 686 sensor is really flagship level camera sensor. Captured pitch dark night sky with google camera night sight (Astrophotography) mode and got very impressive results which can easily beat a DSLR camera. The stars captured in image were so fade in reality that they were not even visible to naked eyes.
Snapdragon 730G SOC is powerful enough to handle the most graphics intensive operations. Played few games capable of achieving 120 fps and they were easily handled by this processor....

Nice Phone, very good camera,good battery backup.and thanks to flipkart.there service is good.no battery problem issues.but when refresh rate are 120 GHz, then battery are slidely drainage.outherwise it's is good for value of money... I realy Love poco X2..you must go for it....

Pros-

I can surely say that it is really value for money phone....if u are looking for awesome camera, battery and performance just go for it without any doubt also charger is enough fast.i also used many phone with IPS LCD display but this one i can say one word.....great.
Cons- i must say that it is little heavier side and also no led notification light enabled by developers while it has that i hope they will fix it next ota update.

Sony IMX 686 sensor is really flagship level camera sensor. Captured pitch dark night sky with google camera night sight (Astrophotography) mode and got very impressive results which can easily beat a DSLR camera. The stars captured in image were so fade in reality that they were not even visible to naked eyes.
Snapdragon 730G SOC is powerful enough to handle the most graphics intensive operations. Played few games capable of achieving 120 fps and they were easily handled by this processor....

Just perfect at this price. Display is good. Volume keys should be placed on the right side. Fingerprint sensor working well. Phone heats up after usage of continue 2-3hours. Camera is "okay". Quality of Back material is good. Having no problem with new realme ui it's simply good. Realme is trying new things in every series. Go For It. You will definitely like it😄😊.
Thanks Flipkart.
Overall Nice phone at this price.
Camera is too good but video recording is not so much stable.. it captures 720p,1080p at 30fps,1080 at 60 fps and it also supports 4k video recording.
Processor is also good. You can play pubg with very smooth experience but there is little heating problem.
Overall it was worth buying this phone. You can also go with this phone without any hesitation.

reviews: Really amazing phone by apple .
Its come with IOS 13.1.3 it’s have really good features like memoji animoji .😎
Simply awesome smart phone👌
I love it😍
Thanks apple .
Thanks Flipkart.
Thanks supercom.
I have bought the 128GB Product RED version.
Being an Android user, it was a different hands-on experience of the XR and Iam really liking it.
Display looks great, sound quality is great, camera quality is good and mainly the gaming performance is so smooth and fast and never felt a single frame drop ever.
Even though its costly for an "Budget" apple iphone, it's worth the money I have spent on this mobile.
Best ever from Iphone
this is my first apple device and i’m very glad that i bought this instead of OnePlues 7pro
The phone has awesome battery backup, sound quality,style , and camera

The phone has a supreme build and a sturdy feel in hands. Coming from a 6S, I felt it was a bit too wide, but It’ll grow on you. The RED is by far the best color among available. And this one is an absolute battery champ and won’t let you down. Charging is also pretty fast if you use a fast charger. I use an iPad 12W charger to top it up and it goes from 10% to 90% within 90 mins. If we take in the factor of longevity of the iPhones (iOS support and updates for atleast next 5 years), this is ...

After using android for 10 yrs m, i moved to iOS and i must say its very difficult to find n use iPhone...i will come to this later , let me start with features: nice camera but not better than samsung note 8.. display bright n good .. nice sound and very good look... a bit bulky...
What irritates me :
1. Setting ur fav song as ringtone: torture to do that...
2. 90% of good app either wallpaper or ringtones or utility: are paid..
3 iCloud only 5gb..
4. Not able to migrate chrome bookmarks ...
Let’s keep it simple,
Phone is damn smooth and if you are coming from Android, you will really notice the difference no matter which smartphone you used earlier.
Pros:
1. Camera and image processing (portrait modes)
2. Battery (7hrs screen on time) i.e. all day battery life

3. iOS (If you are coming from Android, you will need 2 days to get used to it.. like gestures and all but once you are into it, there's no way turning back. Animations are refined and you will enjoy them)
4. Face ID is su...

Awesome ❤️. Just go for it. I am very happy with my decision for buying XR instead of iPhone 8 Plus, X, XS and XS Max. Here are the comparisons among these models which made it easy for me to decide to buy this iPhone
Screen:
1. This iPhone has HD screen but others have full HD. Still it doesn’t disappoint me while watching full HD video.
2. Perfect screen size, Not too big(8 Plus, XS Max) and Not very small(iPhone X or iPhone XS).
Design:
1. All these models (except 8 plus) have new iPhon...

Thanks to Flipkart & team for helping me with my replacement within stipulated time as they promised and thanx to seller too. My story didn't went well with device, first time i received product which was bit defective so i have gone through replacement process which went well and good. Finally I received my first ever iPhone with all nuts and bolts properly sealed and satisfied through service by flipkart. (Add on happiness when i received "assembled in India" product though it my luck may be)

I feel as if the people who gave the iPhone XR low ratings either didn't know what they were getting or didn't do research. I did a lot of research about the XR by watching a lot of Youtube videos of what the XR had to offer and the changes made from the previous iPhone models. The first thing is that the XR doesn't have a Finger Print Home Button, instead it uses Face Recognition to unlock it or a Pin Code. Second thing is that the Control Center has moved from swiping up from the bottom to ...

Shifted from iPhone SE to XR .....a sea change .  The Camera both front and rear are amazing with fantastic editing options . The Face ID makes unlocking phone apps etc so smooth , the size is also just right ...anything bigger than this should be called tab . The screen resolution is good . I am enjoying my iPhone XR,

Mobile is very handy. Packed with good performances and nice camera. This is my first iPhone. Very good experience with Apple. Battery is worst. I am hardly getting 5 hours screen on time.  Positive thing is I came to know how many hours I was spending on my mobile. Because of poor battery now I am only using mobile for 4 hours a day.

Let's face it. The main reason you're even considering this is because you want a compact phone that doesn't compromise on power. Getting OS updates for another 4-5 years, with a decent camera, waterproofing and wireless charging is just an added advantage.
There's a few things it could've done better:
1. Battery is barely adequate for a day of moderate usage.
2. The bezels could have been reduced to have more screen to body ratio.
3. Night mode for the camera was a software feature that ...
One word.. beautiful iphone ❤️ premium feel
Just go for it without any doubt. Superb camera, handy, white color is soo good.
This phone is for someone who don't like big screen phones.
Everything is fine of this mobile except battery.
Battery consumption at 8-10% Brightness in
Video call : almost 4% reduction for every 5-6 mins.
Phone call : almost 1% reduction for every 4-5 mins.
Which seems to be bit faster consumption. First iPhone I’m using. I’m not sure about regular battery consumption rate. But this doesn’t look nice to me.

Keep the battery aside and I don’t see any other reason why you shouldn’t buy it. It’s super fast, has an awesome pair of camera, punchy speaker, good looks, beautiful screen, perfect size and an amazing user experience. Everything about this phone is no nonsense.

Coming to battery, I was aware it was less but I didn’t care because for my casual usage, it easily lasts 24hours. It easily gives an onscreen time of 4 hours per day and if you are using your phone for more than that, you know you...
The powerful small phone that I always wished for !!
Nowadays the fad is big screen phones but for me, I like a small powerful phone with awesome camera. Ticked all the boxes that I had in my mind.
Switched from android. Never going back!
Like It, Apple SE very nice and handy mobile, we can use it by single hand, like it too much if you are going single handy mobile you can go with Apple SE 2020 without any hesitation.

As being a frequent apple user, I couldn't find much of a difference when comparing to IPhone 6.The size and display are the same of IPhone 6 and ofcourse there is 0 negative comments for the A13 chip. It is super fast✌️.
Overall it's the same iPhone 6 with an A13 chip and the generation updates a smartphone can get in 2020.
No negative comments for the camera, apple is always the topper in capturing moments and SE2 has got the studio lights, a front facing portrait camera, a wider photo fr...

reviews: After Use of 3 days i am posting this review
1. Phone is good at this price range.
2. Battery is  excellent
3. Display i mean quality graphics is not good as      Samsung and Moto
4.Camra is ok but  as expected  48 megapixel
5.  Big Display of  6.7 inch
6. Few app that is bamed by Indian government is pre installed
7. Face look is good and only side mounted finger sensor
8 With phone back cover is provided inside the case only and lamination glass is already there so no need to buy ac...

Awesome mobile... Great experience.... Battery backup is great... After full charge I used it 26hrs continuously.....Specially macro camera is superb... Those who likes photography this phone is best in this budget... & I suggest to buy it....
Hi all,
As I have bought Poco M2 pro on first sale, I would like to share my review on this.
I would give you my honest experience..
I will talk only about the Lacunas/cons of this phone,
1.Battery-it lasts only for 24 hrs by general use,(like phone call, YouTube, whatsup video call) without gaming, while gaming it's battery drains fastly, for charging it takes 1.21 hrs.
2.Camera-As it is 48 MP, I personally did not find anything like 48 MP, rather samsung M30 has better quality of pics than ...
I was waiting for this Mobile for 1 month.. Then finally got it from 2nd flash sale,
Pros
Fast charging
Blazing fast Snapdragon 720G
Excellent battery backup
Premium in hand feel
Smooth performance
Cons
Camera is not good
No Optical zoom camera
No AMOLED screen
No high refresh rate sreeen
HDR graphic not supported on Pubg
Chinese app pre installed
Phone Little bit heavy and Larger
Phone is awesome
I have use this phone last 5 day better is too good fast charging seaport also
I have also play pubg in this phone overall very good phone
Very Good Product In This Price Range.
1)In hand Feel 8/10
2)Battery 9/10

Nothing else to say about this device.  Worth for money.  Many say about the processor, but for a daily use its more than enough.  And as I don't play games like pubG and all, i have no complaints.  My budget was 10k.  This was apt.
About the display, though HD+, it gives impressive output.

Overview: Great product with probably best specs at this price point. Decent camera, great looks, great battery and charging.
Design:Looks great and classy due to gorilla glass at back. camera bump is slightly bigger but this issue can fixed by using cover. Phone is slightly bigger.

Display:It has 6.67inch ips lcs display. Viewing angles are good has Decent brightness. There is screen bleeding around camera cutout and edges of display but not a big deal every lcd djisplay has screen bleedin...

Display: im the one who used Samsung s7 sAmoled 551ppi QHD+ display for 3 yrs. So this kinda a let down for me. Contrast level is good & colors are well calibrated but still u can feel a downgrade if u have used a AMOLED panel before. & 90hz would have been greatest. I think faster refresh rate boomed amoled growth in India, every phone around 15k-20k was coming with amoled & then high refresh rate arrived with oneplus & all company started giving lcd with 90/120hz I will still prefer sAmoled...

Cons- i must say that it is little heavier side and also no led notification light enabled by developers while it has that i hope they will fix it next ota update.

This phone looks good with great battery backup and best processer in this price range
But camera is not good as i expacted. Previously i used redmi phone which camera was quite good than this.
So guys if you want to buy camera eccentric phone then don't buy it.

If we talk about phone it has some pros and cons.
PROS:
PERFORMANCE: Mediatek Helio G70 performs very good, considering the price range.
REAR CAMERA: Rear camera is above average during days but struggles in night or low light, But if you use PRO mode then it can take some good shots.
BATTERY: It is one of the major highlights of the phone and lasts about more than 24 hours in moderate usage.
SECURITY: Fingerprint and face unlock is fast ...
📲 Performance - good
🎮 Gaming - good experience at this price range
❣️ Realme UI - excellent but somewhere optimization should be required by developers that is not big issue
📱 Display response - average
🔋 Battery - very impressive
📸 Camera - average
🔒 Privacy - better than another UI android phones
✨ >> Overall 4.7 rating out of 5 >> ✨

If you are looking for a smart phone and having low budget then go for it....best battery ...camera quality is also good according to this pice...you can also play pubg...processor is also fantastic...I will highly recommend it.
The mobile is perfect for the guy who wants the best battery backup with some gaming capabilities.
Pros-

*The battery life. I use Facebook ' whatsapp" mostly, after getting 5.5 hrs screen on time, still 74% battery left, you can imagine how good the battery's performance is. this phone will last you 2 days even with heavy use. if you are a normal user like me, then this phone battery will last for 4-5 days for sure.
Don't go for other brands if you want better battery backup, blindly go for r...

Best in class segment as per budget as it comes under 10000 bucks.pubg works great, battery is phenomenal and display is quite good,no lag in performance & sound is crisp.camera works good in daylight but the body is polycarbonate and hence made it look cheaper,other than this a great value for your bucks.
Really promising product from realme SOLID BUDGET DEVICE!!
Build quality is excellent as well as performance is also great and that battery backup is next level KEEP IT UP REALME!! But little disappointed with flipkart delivery person.
Realme have fixed the side screen not working issue when in landscape mode in the layest update, really glad abt it THANKS REALME!!
It's awesome phone look like branded .... display awesome ... first look I really love it...
This product is very good its performance is excellent battery backup is very good this phone with excellent performance at very low price

Overview: Great product with probably best specs at this price point. Decent camera, great looks, great battery and charging.
Design:Looks great and classy due to gorilla glass at back. camera bump is slightly bigger but this issue can fixed by using cover. Phone is slightly bigger.

Display:It has 6.67inch ips lcs display. Viewing angles are good has Decent brightness. There is screen bleeding around camera cutout and edges of display but not a big deal every lcd djisplay has screen bleedin...

Display: im the one who used Samsung s7 sAmoled 551ppi QHD+ display for 3 yrs. So this kinda a let down for me. Contrast level is good & colors are well calibrated but still u can feel a downgrade if u have used a AMOLED panel before. & 90hz would have been greatest. I think faster refresh rate boomed amoled growth in India, every phone around 15k-20k was coming with amoled & then high refresh rate arrived with oneplus & all company started giving lcd with 90/120hz I will still prefer sAmoled...

Overview: Great product with probably best specs at this price point. Decent camera, great looks, great battery and charging.
Design:Looks great and classy due to gorilla glass at back. camera bump is slightly bigger but this issue can fixed by using cover. Phone is slightly bigger.

Display:It has 6.67inch ips lcs display. Viewing angles are good has Decent brightness. There is screen bleeding around camera cutout and edges of display but not a big deal every lcd djisplay has screen bleedin...

Display: im the one who used Samsung s7 sAmoled 551ppi QHD+ display for 3 yrs. So this kinda a let down for me. Contrast level is good & colors are well calibrated but still u can feel a downgrade if u have used a AMOLED panel before. & 90hz would have been greatest. I think faster refresh rate boomed amoled growth in India, every phone around 15k-20k was coming with amoled & then high refresh rate arrived with oneplus & all company started giving lcd with 90/120hz I will still prefer sAmoled...

Mobile is very handy. Packed with good performances and nice camera. This is my first iPhone. Very good experience with Apple. Battery is worst. I am hardly getting 5 hours screen on time.  Positive thing is I came to know how many hours I was spending on my mobile. Because of poor battery now I am only using mobile for 4 hours a day.

Let's face it. The main reason you're even considering this is because you want a compact phone that doesn't compromise on power. Getting OS updates for another 4-5 years, with a decent camera, waterproofing and wireless charging is just an added advantage.
There's a few things it could've done better:
1. Battery is barely adequate for a day of moderate usage.
2. The bezels could have been reduced to have more screen to body ratio.
3. Night mode for the camera was a software feature that ...
One word.. beautiful iphone ❤️ premium feel
Just go for it without any doubt. Superb camera, handy, white color is soo good.
This phone is for someone who don't like big screen phones.
Everything is fine of this mobile except battery.
Battery consumption at 8-10% Brightness in
Video call : almost 4% reduction for every 5-6 mins.
Phone call : almost 1% reduction for every 4-5 mins.
Which seems to be bit faster consumption. First iPhone I’m using. I’m not sure about regular battery consumption rate. But this doesn’t look nice to me.

Keep the battery aside and I don’t see any other reason why you shouldn’t buy it. It’s super fast, has an awesome pair of camera, punchy speaker, good looks, beautiful screen, perfect size and an amazing user experience. Everything about this phone is no nonsense.

Coming to battery, I was aware it was less but I didn’t care because for my casual usage, it easily lasts 24hours. It easily gives an onscreen time of 4 hours per day and if you are using your phone for more than that, you know you...
The powerful small phone that I always wished for !!
Nowadays the fad is big screen phones but for me, I like a small powerful phone with awesome camera. Ticked all the boxes that I had in my mind.
Switched from android. Never going back!
Like It, Apple SE very nice and handy mobile, we can use it by single hand, like it too much if you are going single handy mobile you can go with Apple SE 2020 without any hesitation.

As being a frequent apple user, I couldn't find much of a difference when comparing to IPhone 6.The size and display are the same of IPhone 6 and ofcourse there is 0 negative comments for the A13 chip. It is super fast✌️.
Overall it's the same iPhone 6 with an A13 chip and the generation updates a smartphone can get in 2020.
No negative comments for the camera, apple is always the topper in capturing moments and SE2 has got the studio lights, a front facing portrait camera, a wider photo fr...

On 3rd charge, I go...
Hi,
I am reviewing this device after 2 days of rapid and rough use,here are my observation-

Battery:- The first noticeable thing is the battery,it gives u amzng battery life,I played almost 7 hrs pubg still 3% left,but it may disappoint you in charging speed ,0 to 90 is almost taking 1.30 hr but next 10% will just unacceptable taking around 1 hr.
Display:- Notchless, punch holeless screen,full screen view will amaze you with HDR10 support colour also look great,not having120hz refresh r...
At this price range I don’t find any better phones and this one with SD 730G, 6GB ram, 128GB internal storage, 5000 mah battery and 64MP quad camera is definitely a good deal.
The pop up 16 MP front camera performs well enough and it makes a good full display without any punch holes or notches.
Display is good enough even though not as much as AMOLED.
Overall this phone will never disappoint with its performance.
Awesome phone at this price camera is good
Battery is awesome performance.... Love flipkart nd motorola 😍😍

It looks gorgeous 😍

Camera is awesome
Selfie is good but needs improvement
Performance is awesome
Has enough customisation option in this one
Moto features are too beneficial
Speakers are best in range 👌
Pop up camera is too durable
Don't think twice buy it now
See camera samples below
CAMERA - isn't as great as one might expect, however there's always a loop hole with GCam versions, which are easily available.
DISPLAY- is pretty good, I have no complaints about it, at this segment.

TURBO POWER CHARGER - All what I heard from the YouTubers about this, seems to be wrong!!! Because I had no issues in getting the device charged, it re-fills the juice pretty fast or your can say as is expected from an 18W adapter.
USER EXPERIENCE - This is something which needs the special...

Captured pitch dark night sky with google camera night sight (Astrophotography) mode and got very impressive results which can easily beat a DSLR camera. The stars captured in image were so fade in reality that they were not even visible to naked eyes.
Snapdragon 730G SOC is powerful enough to handle the most graphics intensive operations. Played few games capable of achieving 120 fps and they were easily handled by this processor....

Overview: Great product with probably best specs at this price point. Decent camera, great looks, great battery and charging.
Design:Looks great and classy due to gorilla glass at back. camera bump is slightly bigger but this issue can fixed by using cover. Phone is slightly bigger.

Display:It has 6.67inch ips lcs display. Viewing angles are good has Decent brightness. There is screen bleeding around camera cutout and edges of display but not a big deal every lcd djisplay has screen bleedin...

Display: im the one who used Samsung s7 sAmoled 551ppi QHD+ display for 3 yrs. So this kinda a let down for me. Contrast level is good & colors are well calibrated but still u can feel a downgrade if u have used a AMOLED panel before. & 90hz would have been greatest. I think faster refresh rate boomed amoled growth in India, every phone around 15k-20k was coming with amoled & then high refresh rate arrived with oneplus & all company started giving lcd with 90/120hz I will still prefer sAmoled...
GREAT 💥 PHONE FROM POCO RECOMMENDED TO EVERYONE WHO WANT TO PURCHASE IT
PROS
1.MASSIVE DISPLAY GREAT QUALITY
2.VALUE FOR MONEY
3. BEAUTIFUL DESIGN
4. POWERFUL SNAPDRAGON 720G FOR PUBG
5. YES CAMERA WAS AMAZING
7.AND YAH 33WT CHARGER
8. IR BLASTER VERY USEFUL
9 48MP CAMERA SAMSUNG GM2 SENSOR BUT SUPERB PICTURES CLICKED
CONS
1.SAME AS REDMI NOTE 9 PRO BUT 33WT CHARGER IS DIFFERENCE
2. NO HIGH REFRESH RATE SCREEN OR AMOLED
3.NO 5G
ANYWAYS SUPERB PHONE WITH POWERFUL PROCESSOR

If we talk about phone it has some pros and cons.
PROS:
PERFORMANCE: Mediatek Helio G70 performs very good, considering the price range.
REAR CAMERA: Rear camera is above average during days but struggles in night or low light, But if you use PRO mode then it can take some good shots.
BATTERY: It is one of the major highlights of the phone and lasts about more than 24 hours in moderate usage.
SECURITY: Fingerprint and face unlock is fast ...
📲 Performance - good
🎮 Gaming - good experience at this price range
❣️ Realme UI - excellent but somewhere optimization should be required by developers that is not big issue
📱 Display response - average
🔋 Battery - very impressive
📸 Camera - average
🔒 Privacy - better than another UI android phones
✨ >> Overall 4.7 rating out of 5 >> ✨

Overview: Great product with probably best specs at this price point. Decent camera, great looks, great battery and charging.
Design:Looks great and classy due to gorilla glass at back. camera bump is slightly bigger but this issue can fixed by using cover. Phone is slightly bigger.

Display:It has 6.67inch ips lcs display. Viewing angles are good has Decent brightness. There is screen bleeding around camera cutout and edges of display but not a big deal every lcd djisplay has screen bleedin...

Display: im the one who used Samsung s7 sAmoled 551ppi QHD+ display for 3 yrs. So this kinda a let down for me. Contrast level is good & colors are well calibrated but still u can feel a downgrade if u have used a AMOLED panel before. & 90hz would have been greatest. I think faster refresh rate boomed amoled growth in India, every phone around 15k-20k was coming with amoled & then high refresh rate arrived with oneplus & all company started giving lcd with 90/120hz I will still prefer sAmoled...
GREAT 💥 PHONE FROM POCO RECOMMENDED TO EVERYONE WHO WANT TO PURCHASE IT
PROS
1.MASSIVE DISPLAY GREAT QUALITY
2.VALUE FOR MONEY
3. BEAUTIFUL DESIGN

5. YES CAMERA WAS AMAZING
7.AND YAH 33WT CHARGER
8. IR BLASTER VERY USEFUL
9 48MP CAMERA SAMSUNG GM2 SENSOR BUT SUPERB PICTURES CLICKED
CONS
1.SAME AS REDMI NOTE 9 PRO BUT 33WT CHARGER IS DIFFERENCE
2. NO HIGH REFRESH RATE SCREEN OR AMOLED
3.NO 5G
ANYWAYS SUPERB PHONE WITH POWERFUL PROCESSOR

Overview: Great product with probably best specs at this price point. Decent camera, great looks, great battery and charging.
Design:Looks great and classy due to gorilla glass at back. camera bump is slightly bigger but this issue can fixed by using cover. Phone is slightly bigger.

Display:It has 6.67inch ips lcs display. Viewing angles are good has Decent brightness. There is screen bleeding around camera cutout and edges of display but not a big deal every lcd djisplay has screen bleedin...

Display: im the one who used Samsung s7 sAmoled 551ppi QHD+ display for 3 yrs. So this kinda a let down for me. Contrast level is good & colors are well calibrated but still u can feel a downgrade if u have used a AMOLED panel before. & 90hz would have been greatest. I think faster refresh rate boomed amoled growth in India, every phone around 15k-20k was coming with amoled & then high refresh rate arrived with oneplus & all company started giving lcd with 90/120hz I will still prefer sAmoled...
